浿字的基本解释

浿
pèi
〔浿水〕今朝鲜青川江和大同江的古称。

浿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pèi］
［《廣韻》普蓋切，去泰，滂。］
古水名。在今朝鲜民主主义人民共和国平壤之北，即今之清川江。一说为今之大同江或鸭绿江。

浿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浿； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第24
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?普蓋切，音霈。水名。【說文】水出樂浪鏤方，東入海。【前漢·地理志】浿水，出遼東塞外，西南至樂浪縣，西入海。　又縣名。【十三州志】浿水縣，在樂浪東北。　又丘名。【括地志】浿丘，在靑州臨湽縣西北。【史記·楚世家】朝發浿丘。　又【廣韻】普拜切【集韻】【韻會】佈拜切，?音湃。又【集韻】博蓋切，音貝。又薄邁切，音敗。義?同。

浿字的起名意思

浿水，今朝鲜青川江和大同江的古称。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
pèi
[Yi Shui] The ancient name of the Qingchuan River and Datong River in North Korea.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pèi］
["Guangyun" Pugeche, go to Thailand, Pang. ]
Ancient water name. North of Pyongyang in the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea today is the Cheongcheon River. One said it is the Datong River or the Yalu River.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　浿; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 625 24
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Pugeche, sound peep. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of the happy wave and the sea, and the east enters the sea. [Pre-Han Geography] Xushui, outside the Great Wall of Liaodong, to Lelang County in the southwest, and into the sea in the west.　Also the county name. [Thirteen Prefectures] Jishui County, in the northeast of Lelang.　Also the name of the hill. 【Include Topography】Jiuqiu, in the northwest of Lintong County, Yizhou. [Historical Records·Chu Family] Chaofa Shuqiu.　[Guangyun] Pubaiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Bubaiqie,? Yinpai. Also 【Jiyun】Bogeqie, Yinbei. It's thin and thin, and the sound is lost. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Yishui is the ancient name of Qingchuan River and Datong River in North Korea.
